title: Jam 2021: Learning and Public Engagement
short_description: Are you a college or university student eager to meet staff whose work connects visitors to art and inspires them to question, confront, and imagine?
header_description: Meet staff whose work connects visitors to art and inspires them to question, confront, and imagine.
list_description: Are you a college or university student eager to meet staff whose work connects visitors to art and inspires them to question, confront, and imagine?
description:
Speakers:

Nancy Chen, Educator, Innovation and Creativity
Ayana Chavis, Educator, Youth and Families
Hillary Cook, Associate Director, Youth and Families

This program is meant for college and university students who want to learn about careers in the museum field from working professionals. Learn more about JAM 2021.
buy_button_caption: This free event is for college and university students only; registration required
